execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers with their first name, middle initial and last name.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name, customer_middle_initial, customer_last_name FROM customers;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve distinct customer_ids that have placed orders (limited to customers returned in step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
